title: PHPget_defined_vars()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPget_defined_vars()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Return all defined variables, as an array:
<?php
$a = array("red", "green", "blue");
$arr = get_defined_vars();
print_r($arr["a"]);
?>

Definition and Usage
The get_defined_vars() function returns all defined variables, as an array.
Syntax
get_defined_vars();
Parameter Values
None.
Technical Details
Return Value:
All the defined variables as a multidimensional array
Return Type:
Array
PHP Version:
4.0.4+

★
+1
